title: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Levadne, Poltavka, Huliaipole, Zaliznychne, Novoandriyivka, Mali Scherbaky of Zapor...
content: At Orikhiv direction Russian army shelled Levadne, Poltavka, Huliaipole, Zaliznychne, Novoandriyivka, Mali Scherbaky of Zaporizhzhia region, - General Staff of Armed Forces of Ukraine says in the evening report
author: Live UA Map
